name: Dark Desire Mute 6
description:
Dark Desire Mute 6


This VISUAL NOVEL continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics. This complex story includes also the life of Stephanie, Michelle, Monica, etc.

There are critical decisions and different paths to take, as well as the outfits options. Choose different outfits where possible.
Sound effects have been added: door open, door close, air conditioning, slap, spank. ambient music or ambient sounds, etc.
******** FULLY VOICED (by voice actors - please see episodes description)

The visual novel has the following episodes:
EP01 - The Party
EP02 - Sweet Cindy and Michelle (this is the same episode as in DDM5 - but it's been fully voiced now)
EP03 - Steph's Revenge (this is the same episode as in DDM5 - but it's been fully voiced now)
--- new path for Katie - fully voiced
--- new path for Addison - fully voiced
EP04 - Steph's Frustration - fully voiced
EP05 - Katie - WORK IN PROGRESS
EP06 - Beth and Steph - WORK IN PROGRESS

EXCITING NEWS
- what little I have in profits I'll gather into a fund and buy stocks with dividend so one day the adult visual novels will be free for you; we'll pay Steam, Adobe, etc.
- check out my Patreon for more info and follow up
For the love of Adult Visual Novels 💕
